nodes.desc: The array of nodes that designates the tree structure

node-key.desc: The property name of each node object that holds a unique node id

label-key.desc: The property name of each node object that holds the label of the node

children-key.desc: The property name of each node object that holds the list of children of the node

no-connectors.desc: Do not display the connector lines between nodes

color.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

control-color.desc: Color name for controls (like checkboxes) from the Quasar Color Palette

text-color.desc: Overrides text color (if needed); Color name from the Quasar Color Palette

selected-color.desc: Color name for selected nodes (from the Quasar Color Palette)

dark.desc: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

icon.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix

tick-strategy.desc: The type of strategy to use for the selection of the nodes

ticked.desc: Keys of nodes that are ticked

expanded.desc: Keys of nodes that are expanded

default-expand-all.desc: Allow the tree to have all its branches expanded, when first rendered

accordion.desc: Allows the tree to be set in accordion mode

filter.desc: The text value to be used for filtering nodes

filter-method.desc: The function to use to filter the tree nodes; For best performance, reference it from your scope and do not define it inline

no-nodes-label.desc: Override default such label for when no nodes are available

no-results-label.desc: Override default such label for when no nodes are available due to filtering

default-header.desc: Slot to use for defining the header of a node

expanded.desc: Is node expanded? Can directly be assigned new Boolean value which changes expanded state

ticked.desc: Is node ticked? Can directly be assigned new Boolean value which changes ticked state

header-[name].desc: Header template slot for describing node header; Used by nodes which have their 'header' prop set to '[name]', where '[name]' can be any string

expanded.desc: Is node expanded? Can directly be assigned new Boolean value which changes expanded state

ticked.desc: Is node ticked? Can directly be assigned new Boolean value which changes ticked state

default-body.desc: Slot to use for defining the body of a node

expanded.desc: Is node expanded? Can directly be assigned new Boolean value which changes expanded state

ticked.desc: Is node ticked? Can directly be assigned new Boolean value which changes ticked state

body-[name].desc: Body template slot for describing node body; Used by nodes which have their 'body' prop set to '[name]', where '[name]' can be any string

expanded.desc: Is node expanded? Can directly be assigned new Boolean value which changes expanded state

ticked.desc: Is node ticked? Can directly be assigned new Boolean value which changes ticked state

update:expanded.desc: Triggered when nodes are expanded or collapsed; Used by Vue on 'update' synched prop

lazy-load.desc: Emitted when the lazy loading of nodes is finished

node.desc: The node to which the new nodes (the children) will be appended

key.desc: The key of the node getting the newly loaded child nodes

done.desc: The callback to be carried out when the loading is successful

fail.desc: The callback to be carried out should the loading fails

update:ticked.desc: Emitted when nodes are ticked/unticked via the checkbox; Used by Vue on 'ticked' synched prop

update:selected.desc: Emitted when selected node changes; Used by Vue on 'selected' synched prop

after-show.desc: Emitted when component show animation is finished

after-hide.desc: Emitted when component hide animation is finished

getNodeByKey.desc: Get the node with the given key

getTickedNodes.desc: Get array of nodes that are ticked

getExpandedNodes.desc: Get array of nodes that are expanded

isExpanded.desc: Determine if a node is expanded

expandAll.desc: Use to expand all branches of the tree

collapseAll.desc: Use to collapse all branches of the tree

setExpanded.desc: Expands the tree at the point of the node with the key given

state.desc: Set to 'true' to expand the branch of the tree, otherwise 'false' collapses it

isTicked.desc: Method to check if a node's checkbox is selected or not

setTicked.desc: Method to set a node's checkbox programmatically

keys.desc: The keys of nodes to tick/untick

state.desc: Set to 'true' to tick the checkbox of nodes, otherwise 'false' unticks them
